languages.text: "Кассия, если вы пожелаете остаться — я почту это за честь".

traits.locale_text: "Кассия, если вы пожелаете остаться — я почту это за честь".

languages.text: "Cassia, I would be honoured if you decided to stay."
languages.original_text: "Кассия, если вы пожелаете остаться — я почту это за честь".

traits.locale_text: "Cassia, I would be honored if you decided to stay."
"Cassia, I would be honored if you decided to stay."
"Cassia, I would be honoured if you decided to stay."
"Cassia, I would be honoured if you decided to stay."
"Cassia, I would be honoured if you decided to stay."

languages.text: “卡西娅，如果你决定留下来，这会是我的荣幸。”
languages.original_text: "Cassia, I would be honoured if you decided to stay."

traits.locale_text: “卡西娅，如果你决定留下来，这会是我的荣幸。”

languages.text: «Cassia, sería un honor que decidiera quedarse».
languages.original_text: "Cassia, I would be honoured if you decided to stay."

traits.locale_text: «Cassia, sería un honor que decidiera quedarse».

languages.text: 「カシア殿、そなたがここに残ると決めてくれたのなら光栄だ」
languages.original_text: "Cassia, I would be honoured if you decided to stay."

traits.locale_text: 「カシア殿、そなたがここに残ると決めてくれたのなら光栄だ」

languages.text: "Cassia, es wäre mir eine Ehre, wenn Ihr beschließen würdet, zu bleiben."
languages.original_text: "Cassia, I would be honoured if you decided to stay."

traits.locale_text: "Cassia, es wäre mir eine Ehre, wenn Ihr beschließen würdet, zu bleiben."

languages.text: « Cassia, ce serait pour moi un grand honneur si vous décidiez de rester. »
languages.original_text: "Cassia, I would be honoured if you decided to stay."

traits.locale_text: « Cassia, ce serait pour moi un grand honneur si vous décidiez de rester. »

languages.text: "Cassia, eğer kalmaya karar verirsen onur duyarım."
languages.original_text: "Cassia, I would be honoured if you decided to stay."

traits.locale_text: "Cassia, eğer kalmaya karar verirsen onur duyarım."
